CustomField.formula: IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Project__c )) , TEXT(Project__r.Deployment_Flow__r.Platform__c) , IF( NOT(ISBLANK( Release__c )), TEXT(Release__r.Project__r.Deployment_Flow__r.Platform__c) , 'Salesforce') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field auto-populates and displays the pipeline platform.
CustomField.label: Platform
